person.persName: F. M Helveti (1st ky cavalry and professor)

body.p:
Lieut. Colonel in 1st Kentucky Cavalry. Professor in the A.M. College at Lexington.
Absent from regiment since 1861 and ordered back to the regiment in 1864.
